title: Alan Watts on video (collection) [1959 -> 1973]
description:
There's a lot of stuff by Alan Watts in audio and text format, not so many videos of him actually on camera. I've collected couple of rare footage from youtube (before it disappears) and added other torrents to make one torrent collecting everything thats out there in video format. A.W. has a great influence on me, thus if you have any other video, kindly let me know, I'd like to see and also update the torrent.

 - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

- Work as Play.mp4                    -> 0:22:58 -> 59,4MB

- Death (1959)                        -> 0:27:08 -> 79,3MB

- Conversation with Myself            -> 0:28:06 -> 73MB

Who's Alan Watts?

"Alan Wilson Watts was a British-born philosopher, writer, and speaker, best known as an interpreter and populariser of Eastern philosophy for a Western audience."
- Wikipedia
